parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC. The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: Host
parameters.description: This parameter is not supported in Alibaba Cloud public cloud.

parameters.name: Keywords
parameters.description: One or more keywords that are used to query error logs.

parameters.name: LogLevel
parameters.description:
The level of the logs to query. Valid values:

*   **ALL**: queries all error logs.
*   **PANIC**: queries only abnormal logs.
*   **FATAL**: queries only critical logs.
*   **ERROR**: queries only error logs.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values:

*   **20**
*   **50**
*   **100**

Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
